info.author: Tiago Danin
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PythonColorize
		==============

		Simple module to colorize text on terminal

		Install ::

			sudo pip3 install PythonColorize

		DOC
		===

		Colors  | Styles             |
		--------|--------------------|
		black   | bold               |
		red     | dark               |
		green   | underline          |
		yellow  | negative           |
		blue    | hide               |
		magenta |                    |
		cyan    |                    |
		white   |                    |

		Params  | Result             |
		--------|--------------------|
		bg_     | background         |
		lg_     | light              |
		bg_lg_  | background & Light |

		Module function
		===============

		Get color ::

			PythonColorize.colors.<[param][style]_>[name]

		<.> Optional

		Colorize ::

			PythonColorize.colorize(text=[text], color=[color], style=[style], light=[True|False], background=[True|False])`
info.keywords: shell terminal python3 python2 color colorize
info.name: PythonColorize
info.summary: Simple module to colorize text on terminal
info.html_description:
PythonColorize
==============

Simple module to colorize text on terminal

Install ::

sudo pip3 install PythonColorize

DOC
===

Colors | Styles |
--------|--------------------|
black | bold |
red | dark |
green | underline |
yellow | negative |
blue | hide |
magenta | |
cyan | |
white | |

Params | Result |
--------|--------------------|
bg_ | background |
lg_ | light |
bg_lg_ | background & Light |

Module function
===============

Get color ::

PythonColorize.colors.<[param][style]_>[name]

<.> Optional

Colorize ::

PythonColorize.colorize(text=[text], color=[color], style=[style], light=[True|False], background=[True|False])`
